alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; McPherson; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:09PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern McPherson, northeastern Ellsworth and southwestern Saline Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 208 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Brookville to 6 miles north of Canton. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salina, Lindsborg, Marquette, Assaria, Brookville, Smolan, Falun, Glendale, Salina Airport, Roxbury, Bridgeport, Kanopolis State Park and Kanopolis Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 66 and 89. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 236 and 243. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
